attributes.action: Ensure that Ofcom do not allocate the unused radio spectrum after the analogue switchover to HDTV services, but instead encourage more SDTV services making better use of the limited Digital Terrestrial TV space available.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a person has enough cash to by HD equipment, they jolly well have enough to pay for HD via sat or cable. I don't see why the licence payer should fund it over Freeview at the expense of further SD services for the bulk of the population.
